    private static final java.lang.String SQL01_CREATE_QUEUE "CREATE TABLE queue (id BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY,name VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL,UNIQUE(name))"
    private static final java.lang.String SQL02_CREATE_MSG "CREATE TABLE message (id BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY,sender INTEGER NOT NULL,receiver INTEGER,context SMALLINT DEFAULT 0,prio SMALLINT DEFAULT 0,create_time INTEGER NOT NULL,message VARCHAR(2000) NOT NULL,FOREIGN KEY (sender) REFERENCES client(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,FOREIGN KEY (receiver) REFERENCES client(id) ON DELETE CASCADE)"
    private static final java.lang.String SQL03_CREATE_MSG_QUEUE_ASSOC "CREATE TABLE msg_queue_assoc (message_id BIGINT NOT NULL references message (id),queue_id BIGINT NOT NULL references queue (id),PRIMARY KEY (message_id, queue_id))"
